newsitem.title: USA: Creative Technology stake held by Vinik.
newsitem.headline: Creative Technology stake held by Vinik.

text.p: A group led by former Fidelity Magellan Fund Manager Jeffrey Vinik said Thursday it holds a 6.3 percent stake in Creative Technology Ltd or 5,521,700 ordinary shares.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it bought its stake between December 6, 1996 and January 22, 1997 at prices ranging from $8.494 to $11.8958 per share.
The group said it acquired the stake in Creative for investment purposes.
Creative, based in Singapore, has expertise in developing and distributing integrated multimedia products for home and office users.
